bioml.note: Email address used for cluster failure notification
Torque
Cluster scheduler (currently supported: Torque, SGE)
labkey
Name of queue to use with the cluster scheduler. If blank, the pipeline will use different names for each type of job. (e.g. "xtandem", "mascot")
no
Set for cluster to perform work locally. Otherwise, cluster nodes transfer input files to the local machine, and transfer back the results.
http
Protocol used for communicating with the mzXML conversion server (supported: http and https)
Name or IP address (and port) of the mzXML conversion server (e.g. converter.myorg.net or 128.124.0.1:8080)
yes
Set if conversion server is running on Windows
http
Protocol used for communicating with the LabKey Server (supported: http and https)
Name or IP address (and port) of the LabKey Server (e.g. labkey.myorg.net or 128.124.0.2:8080)
/labkey
Context path of the LabKey web application on the LabKey Server (default install currently uses '/labkey' but values such as '/cpas' and '/CPAS' have been used in the past)
yes
Set if the LabKey Server is running on Windows
T:
Windows prefix for mapping paths on Unix scheduler to Windows servers
/home
Unix prefix for mapping paths on Unix scheduler to Windows servers
/data/databases
Default path where FASTA files are kept
